attributes.action: accept the right of both straight and gay teenagers to be adopted and/or fostered by parents of their choice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teenagers should be given the right to settle in a home with adults of their choice. In practice this means that straight teens can be fostered (or adopted) by gay or straight "parents", and that gay teens can choose between straight or gay "parents" without suffering any prejudice according to law.
